div.p:
Dear colleague,
We inform you that you have not completed the working hours per day according to the Personnel regulations.
Kind regards,
HR Department

Hello,
These employees did not finish 7 hours of work yesterday ( ${ctx['day']})
Last name
First name Arrived
Hours worked
% for employee in ctx['list1']:
${employee.employee.name}
${employee.employee.prenom}
${employee.check_in'}
${employee.worked_hours} H
% endfor
Kind regards,

Hello,
These employees did not finish 5 hours of work Friday ( ${ctx['day']})
Last name
First name Arrived
Hours worked
% for employee in ctx['list2']:
${employee.employee.name}
${employee.employee.prenom}
${employee.check_in'}
${employee.worked_hours} H
% endfor
Kind regards ,

Bonjour,
L'employeé ${ctx['employee']} avec le matricule ${ctx['matricule']} a arrivé avant heure le ${ctx['jour']} .
Cordialement,

Bonjour,
L'employeé ${ctx['employee']} avec le matricule ${ctx['matricule']} a sorti avant heure le ${ctx['jour']} .
Cordialement,

Hello,
% for alloc in ctx['allocations']:
Your leave balance in ${alloc.type_allocation} is ${alloc.balance_leave} day(s)
% endfor
Your emergency leave balance is ${ctx['emergency_leave']} day(s).
Have a good day! ,

Bonjour,
L’evaluation annuelle sera dans ${ctx['days']} jours, le ${ctx['date']}.
Cordialement,

Bonjour,
La réévaluation annuelle sera dans ${ctx['days']} jours, le ${ctx['date']}.
Cordialement,

Dear colleague,
We have noticed that you are absent the ${ctx['date']}, therefore, you are kindly requested to regularize your absence in Human Resources Department.
Regards
HR Department

Dear colleague,
Please be informed that you came late today at ${ctx['day']}
Kind regards,
HR Department

Hey,
These employees arrived late this week
Day
Firstname
Lastname
Arrived
Number of hours late
% for employee_ret in ctx['employees_retard']:
${employee_ret.jour}
${employee_ret.employee.name}
${employee_ret.employee.prenom}
${employee_ret.retard_time}
% endfor
Regards,
HR Department

Hey,
These employees arrived late this month
Day
Lastname
Firstname
Arrived
Number of hours late
% for employee_ret in ctx['employees_retard']:
${employee_ret.jour}
${employee_ret.employee.name}
${employee_ret.employee.prenom}
${employee_ret.retard_time}
% endfor
Regards,
HR Department
